data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of East Godavari to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of East Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of East Godavari.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in East Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in East Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Madiga Dasu people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, teach the young people in the county of East Godavari to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 56,697 believers in the county of East Godavari to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary:
the county of East Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India has a population of 5,154,300.

We estimate East Godavari has 56,697 people who might know Jesus, 62,539 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,035,064 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of East Godavari, Andhra Pradesh, India.
